Welcome to MeridianAlgo's documentation!
==========================================

MeridianAlgo is a comprehensive Python library for algorithmic trading and financial analysis. It provides tools for backtesting trading strategies, calculating technical indicators, and managing trading operations.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   quickstart
   api
   examples
